availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Buffen. Father of Sally A. Buffen, Charles Buffen, William H. Buffen, Susan Buffen, and John T. Buffen. Laborer in Franklin County in 1860. Private in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.).

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, District 1, p. 24.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 114.
